faq.title: YouTube Vanced とは？
faq.description:
YouTube Vanced is a modified version of YouTube with extra features to make your YouTube experience better!

Such features include:
- Background playback,
- Picture in Picture (PiP),
- Black theme (OLED friendly),
- Ads removal (requires enabling),
- Override max resolution (allow playback of video with a resolution higher than your screen),
- ...and much more!

For more information, visit <https://vancedapp.com>

faq.title: ダウンロードボタンはどこにありますか?
faq.description:
Of course, Google won't allow a modified version of its own app to be on their store so don't look for it on the Google Play Store those are fake apps.

Vanced apps can be downloaded and installed using Vanced Manager which can be found on our official website: <https://vancedapp.com> but you can also grab it from [GitHub repo](https://github.com/YTVanced/VancedManager/releases/latest)

faq.title: YouTube Vanced は自動的に更新されますか?
faq.description:
いいえ。

Vanced Manager は更新が可能になり次第、通知を送信します。

また、[Discord サーバー](https://discord.gg/wYrRPgv) に参加するか、[Telegram チャンネル](https://t.me/Vanced)をフォローすることで最新のニュースを受け取ることもできます。

faq.title: Vanced は動画をダウンロードできますか?
faq.description:
Vanced doesn't include any video downloading feature and never will.

Many videos are available to download for free in [selected countries](https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/6141269). For the rest of the world, please get YouTube Premium.

Again, Vanced WILL NEVER add a video downloader to the app or anything similar.

This has been the reason for the shutdown of many YouTube mods in the past as Google doesn't like people downloading copyrighted content from their platform so don't ask for it!!!

faq.title: スワイプジェスチャーが動作しないのはなぜですか?
faq.description: If you have comments shown at the bottom (old place) in Vanced settings > Layout settings, disable it and restart the app. If that doesn't work, force stop the app and clear its data.

faq.title: 字幕が利用できませんか?
faq.description: それは問題ではありません。すべての動画に字幕があるわけではありません。

faq.title: 寄付を受け付けていますか?
faq.description:
We DO NOT accept donations!

Any sort of donations under any circumstances and any sites or links or posts that ask for donations are simply fake.

But if you want to support Vanced developers, you can download Brave using [this link](https://brave.com/kev231) and AdGuard using [this link](https://adguard.com/en/welcome.html?aid=31141).

faq.title: How to make the player layout auto-hide?
faq.description: You can configure it in YouTube Vanced > Settings > Accessibility. If the settings fail to open or doesn't work, go to your device accessibility settings and disable sound amplifier, switch access, live caption.

faq.title: なぜ分割 APK を使用するのですか?
faq.description:
Because:

1. The stock app uses it so Vanced uses it too.
2. It only installs the languages you specify to reduce storage consumption.
3. It has the only version of core APK that your device requires.

Of course, the Vanced Manager or developers can convert it to a normal, single APK file, but we are so lazy to do it. You just need to get along with what we have...

Don't worry though, Vanced Manager does all the hard work for you so just tap on the `Install` button.

faq.title: Why the colour in the startup screen is different from the theme?
faq.description: The startup screen background color is taken from the Android framework colour to make sure it changes according to the system theme. You can use [Substratum](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=projekt.substratum) or [Swift Installer](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.brit.swiftinstaller) or a similar app to change the colour.

faq.title: Should I re-download the installation files?
faq.description: Files can be corrupted because of various reasons and can cause problems afterward. To avoid this, you can choose to download it again to ensure your installation goes smoothly.

faq.title: Why does the root version don't have Microphone permission?
faq.description: It does if your Vanced is up-to-date.

faq.title: ExoPlayer v1 とは?
faq.description: It's an older version of the current media player used by YouTube. You might get better performance and stability when using it.

faq.title: 非表示設定を有効にするには?
faq.description: In Vanced settings, tap on the `About` section 6-7 times to enable it. This only enables the additional video codec settings.

faq.title: Why the root variant doesn't work with microG Core?
faq.description:
1. You need to have at least the [pico](https://github.com/opengapps/opengapps/wiki/Pico-Package) variant of GApps to run Vanced.

2. You can’t run Vanced with microG Core without Google Play Services Framework which is available in all GApps packages and it's a required library.

3. If you are worried about your privacy & don’t want to use GApps but still want to use watch YouTube without ads, then the [web version](https://youtube.com) is always available.

faq.title: Why casting doesn't work?
faq.description: It works if your microG is up-to-date.

faq.title: APK 署名とは何ですか?
faq.description:
You are reading this because you are not using Vanced Manager or you may have installed Vanced from an unofficial source.
Just use Vanced Manager!

You can safely download Vanced Manager from:
- Official site <https://vancedapp.com>
- [GitHub repository](https://github.com/YTVanced/VancedManager/releases/latest)

faq.title: YouTube Vanced は Play Store で入手できますか?
faq.description:
NO!
Again, DO NOT install or even try to search for any fake apps named "YouTube Vanced" or similar on the Play Store or any app stores to install Vanced.

We only have [Vanced Guide](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.vanced.faq), and it's the only official app published on Play Store.

If you find any other app with our icon and name, report it as impersonation and give it a bad review.

Our apps can only be found at <https://vancedapp.com>.

faq.title: Why is Vanced not showing up in home screen or app drawer?
faq.description:
You are reading this because you are not using Vanced Manager or you may have installed Vanced from an unofficial source.
Just use Vanced Manager!

You can safely download Vanced Manager from:
- Official site <https://vancedapp.com>
- [GitHub repository](https://github.com/YTVanced/VancedManager/releases/latest)

faq.title: ビデオが再生できません
faq.description: アプリを再起動してみてください。もしくは、インターネットの接続、デバイスの問題の可能性があります。

faq.title: なぜ 480p に制限されているのですか?
faq.description: Due to the COVID-19, Google is restricting data usage of several countries. This happens on the server and affects both Vanced and stock YouTube users.

fields.title: Workarounds:
fields.content:
1. Connect to a VPN of a different region.
2. Use the [web version](https://youtube.com)
3. Since the 480p restriction is only for phones and not tablets, you can change the device model in YouTube Vanced to overcome the restriction.

#### How to change the device model?
1. Open YouTube Vanced.
2. Go to Settings
3. Tap the `Vanced Settings`
4. Enable hidden settings:
  - Scroll down and tap on the `About` section till you get a message saying `Hidden settings enabled`.
5. Go to `Codec override`
6. Set manufacturer to `Samsung` and model to `SM-T865`.
7. Restart the app.

After restarting, the 480p limit should be gone.

faq.title: どうやって microG の通知を非表示にしますか?
faq.description:
To hide microG the notification, you can disable battery optimization for microG and reboot your device.

If the notification is still there after reboot, disable microG notifications by holding on to the notification, toggle it off and tap Save.

Disabling app notifications can be done in different ways depending on the Android user interface. If you don't know how to disable it, try using Google for learning how to disable it.

faq.title: Does 1440p look better on my 1080p screen?
faq.description:
Yes, but only if the video ratio is something like 18:9, 21:9, ... You can enable `Stats for nerds` in Settings > General to confirm it.

To enable higher resolutions, go to Vanced settings > Video settings and turn on `Max resolution` then restart the app.
